title: Smartgoat
author: Smartgoat
content: when it's not yet your turn, don't be tempted to think people ahead of you are using juju to succeed. it's their turn. keep on clapping for them and do not envy them. your turn will definitely come if you remain consistent and never give up.your dream is to succeed and it's why you are fighting and struggling to succeed. that's why you are swallowing in pains and making personal sacrifices for success. But do you know that there are friends and relatives whose dreams and prayers in life is for you to fail.And the moment you fail, they have succeeded. they will be so happy because they have achieved their lifetime ambition. so, don't give up. keep on keeping on . shame and prove them wrong by succeeding. and don't give them joy by failing.Abi. will you allow them, smile at your down fail one day.

comments.author: Perfectbaby
comments.body: See any one who determined to succeed will never Wait for any body to encourage them, anyone who have massively touched and smell poverty will never wait for encouragement words or inspiration because inspiration are mainly for the weak which I want to say no one a weakler here. Everyone has their own time the best is to follow and rejoice then pick up courage let what you are seeing sounds as a lubricant to your efforts, poweyand time to achieve what you wanted.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Smartgoat on September 08, 2023, 08:58:08 PMwhen it's not yet your turn, don't be tempted to think people ahead of you are using juju to succeed. it's their turn. keep on clapping for them and do not envy them. your turn will definitely come if you remain consistent and never give up.Every body they hustle for different way and even people way you and them they inside kind of hustle fit they see the rubbers and get work pass you, those ones nah base on how them they carry package their work and the kind of connections way them get. Nah who they compete with person fuck up big time, because envy go way you down you no go fit put pressure for where u suppose use hustle again, base on say u don already carry am for mind say eh no fit work again since people way pass u they front or say others they use juju carry they make am, me I they always tell people say if u feel say nah Juju them they use and ur own God no wan Favour u, my brother no need to talk to much u kwanu go do ur own make everybody rest. @Op as you talk am, celebrate who pass you, every body turn go reach for success. But eh no go just come if the person seat down for one place and him no wan work, bcuz him go wait tire the success go always they pass am by, if Watin u they work no they Favour u as u expect am, Watin the person need do nah to observe where the error they come from them then change some tactics so that things for stew for the person make eh follow trends make others follow call am ritualist. You no go carry marketing update and pattern of work way don cast they use follow up work come they expect say things go work as before, when ur competitors don upgrade finish.

comments.author: Kodec5
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on September 09, 2023, 06:40:35 AMQuote from: Smartgoat on September 08, 2023, 08:58:08 PMwhen it's not yet your turn, don't be tempted to think people ahead of you are using juju to succeed. it's their turn. keep on clapping for them and do not envy them. your turn will definitely come if you remain consistent and never give up.@Op as you talk am, celebrate who pass you, every body turn go reach for success. But eh no go just come if the person seat down for one place and him no wan work, bcuz him go wait tire the success go always they pass am by, if Watin u they work no they Favour u as u expect am, Watin the person need do nah to observe where the error they come from them then change some tactics so that things for stew for the person make eh follow trends make others follow call am ritualist. You no go carry marketing update and pattern of work way don cast they use follow up work come they expect say things go work as before, when ur competitors don upgrade finish. Just as wetin dis our senior man don talk, sometimes no be juju or any thing na just say sometime we dey lack this kind of packaging for our business or job.Normally e get how u go use brand ur business like this eh, e go dey much attractive than ur competitors, so make we try they follow the upgrade as time goes on e go really help our business. Also make we try dey happy for who dey succeed oh, Bible don talk am wetin u wish for others, make e also wish for ur self, as ur neighbor dey success follow they rejoice because normally e go reach ur turn.

comments.author: Antotena
comments.body: Quote from: Smartgoat on September 08, 2023, 08:58:08 PMwhen it's not yet your turn, don't be tempted to think people ahead of you are using juju to succeed. it's their turn. keep on clapping for them and do not envy them. your turn will definitely come if you remain consistent and never give up.your dream is to succeed and it's why you are fighting and struggling to succeed. that's why you are swallowing in pains and making personal sacrifices for success. But do you know that there are friends and relatives whose dreams and prayers in life is for you to fail.And the moment you fail, they have succeeded. they will be so happy because they have achieved their lifetime ambition. so, don't give up. keep on keeping on . shame and prove them wrong by succeeding. and don't give them joy by failing.Abi. will you allow them, smile at your down fail one day. Normally, na who give up na him fuck up. Life you see have it ways it get back at you no matter smart you played on it, it will break you sometimes that you begin to question yourself if you are unfortunate but that's how it's. You just bounce back and put your shot together and make sure the mistake don't repeat it again. It's possible that during the time of trying again, you will fall down over and over again but giving up is never an option, if you keep up with the consistency, you will get it right at one point in life.

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: Success will come when you are hard-working and determined to achieve your goals, the worst mistake anyone will ever make, is to give up on whatever goals they have planned to achieve, The journey might look so narrow and discouraging, but if you know where you are going it will seem easy, life in general is not easy, every successful person on earth has one pathetic story or the other to tell, I must say it loud and clear, what matters here is your determination and your ability to learn, relearn and put what you have learnt so far into practice by giving this prestigious forum your best contribution. With what I have learnt in this forum, everything here is practical, there is no magic, any height you want to attain, you will, but it all depends on you and what you want.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Hmmm that no give up thing get as e bi even though I sabi say things don turn upside down for the country. I no say hungry no dey kill person directly but na the sickness wey e go result to due to malnutrition. Situation is critical my brother, some people don enter depression because no way left or right.Them say person wey dey alive still get hope, na on this level we go still dey push whatever challenge wey we dey see for the country. Not giving up is a good thing but doing what will profit you is another.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Smartgoat on September 08, 2023, 08:58:08 PMwhen it's not yet your turn, don't be tempted to think people ahead of you are using juju to succeed. it's their turn. keep on clapping for them and do not envy them. your turn will definitely come if you remain consistent and never give up. your dream is to succeed and it's why you are fighting and struggling to succeed. that's why you are swallowing in pains and making personal sacrifices for success.Na this no be your turn talk be the reason people no dey hustle again as dem dey think say everybody tune go come just like dat without knowing wetin those people's wey dey chop now dun scarified, you see person side dey soft and u dey envy. Relax urself because if dem tell you wetin dat person dun do in the past to reach where him dey now you no go believe. No dey envy anybody and just celebrate their success because if you hustle too people go celebrate you. Everybody get e own time but dat one no mean say you no go hustle oh because last last na hustling sure pass and when you hustle wella your own turn no go pass you by. Na who give up fuck up because if you still dey breath hope dey. Even dat juju wey you dey say person dey use, you think say e easy to do juju, if e easy why everybody no dey do am. Quote from: Smartgoat on September 08, 2023, 08:58:08 PMBut do you know that there are friends and relatives whose dreams and prayers in life is for you to fail. And the moment you fail, they have succeeded. they will be so happy because they have achieved their lifetime ambition. so, don't give up. keep on keeping on . shame and prove them wrong by succeeding. and don't give them joy by failingAll those ones no supposed dey concern you because if you no plan bad for others God no go allow bad plans spoil your own show. Just dey do ur thing dey go and they hustle ur hustle legitimately and when na ur turn to chop, everything go begin fall in place. People go always wish you bad because no be everybody dey like when person dey chop pass dem or their own no better and the other person dey get grace like say na him papa get better tomorrow wey we all dey find so. Na we Africans too dey believe all dis bad relative talk because of too much films and stories wey we dey hear and no even know if dem be true. I hope you know say wetin you dey think na wetin ur brain go believe and everything go begin dey fall in line with wetin you dey think, sometimes nobody dey do us but we na our thinking na wetin dey us and negative energy just dey complete the thing for us.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Succession or successfulness depends on people and what they are doing at the current time, you can be doing work that is meant to make you rich but since you do not believe in yourself may not lead you to successfully become rich at the appointed time but if your heart is fully dedicated on the work you are doing, meaning you devote your time and remained focused you will that you quickly became successful even though you didn't envy anyone or someone envying you. As long as you didn't remain idle at all points will not make you poor, so the greatest thing to do is keep working and believing your Maker to bless you one day and surely the result will come.Anybody who never wants to progress in life are the sets of people who keeps complaining and those people never makes progress in their lives and concerneth to what they laid their hands. Your turn go only come when you keep pushing the hustle at all cost without waiting for the appointed time to come, one tin me believe be say as you dey work the more luckier you became successful than to relax one place say your turn dey come.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on September 10, 2023, 12:30:01 PMAll those ones no supposed dey concern you because if you no plan bad for others God no go allow bad plans spoil your own show. Just dey do ur thing dey go and they hustle ur hustle legitimately and when na ur turn to chop, everything go begin fall in place. People go always wish you bad because no be everybody dey like when person dey chop pass dem or their own no better and the other person dey get grace like say na him papa get better tomorrow wey we all dey find so. Na we Africans too dey believe all dis bad relative talk because of too much films and stories wey we dey hear and no even know if dem be true. I hope you know say wetin you dey think na wetin ur brain go believe and everything go begin dey fall in line with wetin you dey think, sometimes nobody dey do us but we na our thinking na wetin dey us and negative energy just dey complete the thing for us. Boss   juju dey for real o but the thing be say make evil eye people no focus attention on us. The only weapon we get na prayer if not things dey happen and no be film or negative mind but if you never witness some things you no go believe say things dey sup. One thing again be say success dey waka hand in hand with time and no be by who hustle pass because people dey hustle for here day and night and door never open. If God don show you way and open your door, e worth thanks giving. As you talk am na so e be because if you give up na you lose because you no go sit down make your time com meet you, na you go stand up go meet your time and allow God to his wonder for you.The God thing about we Nigerians be say we are very strong people who dey do things with determination but internet dey give us bad name all over but the truth be say we no dey give up easily. As long as we no spoil person own, I pray make our own no spoil and make God wisdom continue dey follow us up and down.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Em get one saying that says ''it is not about how far you have gone in life, it is how well you come out of it''. This life we d live so no be competition, there's time for peso to succeed in life, and there seems to be no short cut to success and there is no hurry in search for success cos everything have there own season(failure and success) in life. The difficulties wey peso d face for life, no go be forever. They are meant to build us to a better version of ourselves. So that when our situation change, we go learn how to manage and control it without misusing the wealth. Not giving up in life remind me years back when I was broke. I had different hustle that wasn't paying me that much. I was let down, and insulted by friends during that period, but the thing be sae I no allow their negative vibes get to me emotionally to do what am not supposed to do. I keep on pushing and believing that someday my story go change. Which it changed. I thank God for that. One thing wey I want make me understand about this life be sae, everything get their own season to ripe. You might be doing something that is not fetching you money today, but in years to come it will. Na about been consistent in your hustle and don't intend to give up whatever legit work you are doing. God promise us sae em go bless us with the works of hands. Whether na small one or big one, em go bless us. But the thing don give up, have faith and be patient. Someday day Oluwa go butter your bread at the right time. Take note: No one ever makes it to the top so easily with a given-up spirit.

comments.author: SmartCharpa
comments.body: Quote from: Smartgoat on September 08, 2023, 08:58:08 PMwhen it's not yet your turn, don't be tempted to think people ahead of you are using juju to succeed. it's their turn. keep on clapping for them and do not envy them. your turn will definitely come if you remain consistent and never give up.your dream is to succeed and it's why you are fighting and struggling to succeed. that's why you are swallowing in pains and making personal sacrifices for success. But do you know that there are friends and relatives whose dreams and prayers in life is for you to fail.And the moment you fail, they have succeeded. they will be so happy because they have achieved their lifetime ambition. so, don't give up. keep on keeping on . shame and prove them wrong by succeeding. and don't give them joy by failing.Abi. will you allow them, smile at your down fail one day. Na waiting dey kill some of us for this life be that most especially my country, where person never reach he will be eager to reach there we know say e no dey easy when someone is growing up without having any source of income, if person dey face one or two things for this life, the best thing to do is to keep praying and have faith over what we are chasing, but if some of are seeing that they keep on pushing, yet there's no green light of becoming somebody na way to give up or to do something bad will be next to be thinking, for this life we need to they over look things, no be say waiting our mate or friends don achieve for this life and we never get, it will lead us to bad things.Make we no allow anything to oppress us, because kind of people dey that do not have patient in life, they can't wait for God to let their time reach to bless them, God time is the best whenever we experience it.

comments.author: Salahmu
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on September 10, 2023, 02:12:23 PMSuccession or successfulness depends on people and what they are doing at the current time, you can be doing work that is meant to make you rich but since you do not believe in yourself may not lead you to successfully become rich at the appointed time but if your heart is fully dedicated on the work you are doing, meaning you devote your time and remained focused you will that you quickly became successful even though you didn't envy anyone or someone envying you. As long as you didn't remain idle at all points will not make you poor, so the greatest thing to do is keep working and believing your Maker to bless you one day and surely the result will come.Anybody who never wants to progress in life are the sets of people who keeps complaining and those people never makes progress in their lives and concerneth to what they laid their hands. Your turn go only come when you keep pushing the hustle at all cost without waiting for the appointed time to come, one tin me believe be say as you dey work the more luckier you became successful than to relax one place say your turn dey come. That's true na, life is not always rossy all the time I don't no why most persons want to become rich overnight without working towards it but expect manner to come down from heaven and fall on them, the funny part of it is that when you are struggling to meet up in life people sees you as someone that has arrived in such a way that if they ask for money from you and you told them you don't have they see you as a stingy person when actually they don't no how much effort your making to survive, In live almost everybody go through difficult and challenges but what brings them to the wealth they have now is consistency in hardworking no matter how many times they fall they stand to overcome the challenge knowing fully well that through there consistency there hustle will pay off.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Smartgoat on September 08, 2023, 08:58:08 PMwhen it's not yet your turn, don't be tempted to think people ahead of you are using juju to succeed. it's their turn. keep on clapping for them and do not envy them. your turn will definitely come if you remain consistent and never give up.That "juju" mention there reminded me of a recent comment Destalker (comedian) made about a fast rising comedian, Akpororo, where he said he thought the later was using juju as he was in constant demand to perform at events. The juju thing has always been the case with the black race, especially those in Africa who've soaked themselves in those obnoxious beliefs and cultural practices where every fast success is attributed to some mystic power.QuoteBut do you know that there are friends and relatives whose dreams and prayers in life is for you to fail.Yes, there are people like that who will wish others evil. However, those people can't be called friends. They're pretenders. Friendship isn't defined as exchanging handshakes and banters with others. We shouldn't tag people as friends simply because we've exchanged something with them. Friendship goes beyond that.

comments.author: Jessie2121
comments.body: Sometimes nah where you find yourself and wetin you dy do nai go determine if you dy go forward or not, if you sit down one place no expect say e go beta in the future. Like them talk, nah where man dy work nai dia him dy chop so if you no work you go chop hunger. So anything you dy do continue and put plenty energy so that plenty profit go come in return and make nothing discourage you even if you see say Mr CryptopreneurBrainBoss and this other senior man Mpamaegbu own beta no worry you turn dey come and no stop wetin you dy do as long as nah good thing no give up.

comments.author: Chilwell
comments.body: Quote from: Jessie2121 on September 12, 2023, 04:24:39 PMSometimes nah where you find yourself and wetin you dy do nai go determine if you dy go forward or not, if you sit down one place no expect say e go beta in the future. Like them talk, nah where man dy work nai dia him dy chop so if you no work you go chop hunger. So anything you dy do continue and put plenty energy so that plenty profit go come in return and make nothing discourage you even if you see say Mr CryptopreneurBrainBoss and this other senior man Mpamaegbu own beta no worry you turn dey come and no stop wetin you dy do as long as nah good thing no give up.Dis life wey you dey see dey required patient and na wen patient dey na em person no dey give up. Rich people wey we dey see today say dey successful na becus dey no give up on Watin dey dey do, if you go sit wit them and ask them say e dey easy for from the beginning of their life, dey go tell you say e no dey easy for dem. We no say riches come from GOD, make sure say you get wetin you dey do to earn a living don't be lazy and dey wait for GOD to come bless you, GOD help people who help themselves.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: E get as e be o because since life no dey fair to everyone and all fingers no dey equal so no body wey go dey happy say other people dey make progress then you come dey stagnant even when you dey hustle pass dose people but yet dem de make good results pass you base on say maybe person na in dey clear road for dem whereby you no get person wey go look out for you too.No be hustle who pass dey carry first dis time again o na base on man know man and your connection na in dey determine your chances of being successful so know how wey person wey no get people to look out for dem go dey happy.Imagine all dis big men children wey everything just dey for them on a platter of gold, no stress, no much hustle dia parents just dey do everything for dem one go begin imagine whether him be non living thing wey no deserve that kind of favor or whether e get something wey him commit or him papa commit wey dey cause yin misfortune.And because of d wicked act of mankind dis days anything wey dey go wrong for person life they start being superstitious and sometimes na true because some wicked people for dis life no just want make anything good happen to dia fellow person maybe because they're afraid dat if u succeed you go dey better than them then dem go now look inferior to you.One big man say if everybody becomes rich say who go wash his car just imagine that mentality of not letting people to be at the top just because you want dem to become slaves to u. U know want make other people rise at all dem wan win every contract anywhere wey dem see say u wan take achieve something dem go block am. So as an individual you can never be happy if you're experiencing all these things and you might even run into depression.So for me I will just encourage people not to give up as the road to success is so narrow even Rome the great city dem no carry one day build am so e dey take time to achieve great results. Forget about those people wey dey oppress you as everyone will not live forever as one day their own cup go full den pave way for you to shine so no matter wetin you dey pass through look forward to a better future and keep pushing forward do not be discouraged everyone has a set time when you time reach no force go fit hinder or stop your glory.

comments.author: shepherd_gee
comments.body: If you say I can't, you'll have to sit back and watch me work as twice hard to prove you wrong. Obi Cubana say miracle no dey give money because that pastor na him need money pass, him add too say native doctor no fit give you money cos na him children dey fetch water for stream, if you wan get money work work. Double and triple your hustle, if na for grace, the grace wey God dey give is sufficient surfer you wake up for morning. Persistent and perseverance matters alot in all your endeavors, no because our country dey in jamboree go make you retire to village for less. Please don't relent keep pushing...

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Op this your motivational talk goes well and e still dey applicable to even investors, e good make we no give up just because of say we see other pipo sey mock us or progress pass us, yes, make we no give up because we know know if the time we take give up we done almost reach the destination way our goodies them dey and make we no surprise say as we give up nah that time we take dey go back back.Because if this not to give up issue, e good make we always set pray to God for more Grace, work and pray nah the right answer to every temptation and e good say if we dey work and things dey go hard make we strive harder and if e still go harder make we go more harder because person way give up nah him lose.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: Smartgoat on September 08, 2023, 08:58:08 PMyour dream is to succeed and it's why you are fighting and struggling to succeed. that's why you are swallowing in pains and making personal sacrifices for success. But do you know that there are friends and relatives whose dreams and prayers in life is for you to fail.If you are preoccupied with this mindset, there is high chances you will fail. This popular Naija cruise of village people have made people so lazy and irresponsible; blaming their failure and woes on innocent villagers. We gat do better bro... no body is winching you, money is the product of services you render.... There is no way you will proffer solution to real problem that you will not get paid... we should not dwell in the lie that there are people somewhere holding us down; I have grown above this.
